synthesis_conditions.drying_details: removal of all solvent under vacuum provided the product as a white solid
synthesis_conditions.additional_details: 1.56 g (4.30 mmol) Zn(CF3SO3)2, 1.87 g (4.30 mmol) Dpg-Tyr-OCH3

synthesis_conditions.drying_details: removal of all solvent under vacuum provided the product as a white solid
synthesis_conditions.additional_details: 1.33 g (3.67 mmol) Zn(CF3SO3)2, 2.00 g (3.67 mmol) Dpg-Nal-OBn

synthesis_conditions.drying_details: collected on a sintered glass filter and dried under vacuum
synthesis_conditions.additional_details: 1.00 g (1.23 mmol) was dissolved, pH adjusted to 9.00, stirred at room temperature until pH remained constant (ca. 2 d), then pH lowered to 4

synthesis_conditions.drying_details: filtered through celite, solvent removed by rotary evaporation, dried under vacuum
synthesis_conditions.additional_details: 1.68 g (1.81 mmol) was dissolved, hydrogen passed over the stirred solution for 6 h at 70 8C
